testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.title: Flower Arrangement Artist
testimonials.comment: Magical experience! The petal physics are wonderfully lifelike and the garden challenges are so creative. I've spent hours designing and still find new floral combinations.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.title: Botany Instructor
testimonials.comment: As a plant science teacher, I'm amazed by the accurate floral behavior. This is a brilliant way to learn about flower properties while creating art.

testimonials.name: Emma Rodriguez
testimonials.title: Creative Hobbyist
testimonials.comment: Perfect for relaxing creativity breaks. The magnetic controls feel natural and the floral visuals are stunning. Absolutely delightful!

testimonials.name: David Thompson
testimonials.title: Floral Competition Judge
testimonials.comment: The festival mode is exceptional! Each garden presents unique floral puzzles that test your design skills in beautiful ways.

testimonials.name: Lisa Park
testimonials.title: Mindfulness Coach
testimonials.comment: Wonderful for stress relief and focus! Creating floral patterns is so meditative yet engaging. It's therapy through nature's beauty.

testimonials.name: James Wilson
testimonials.title: Master Gardener
testimonials.comment: This captures the essence of floral artistry. The attention to different petal types and their magnetic responses is extraordinary.
